moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

moves.name: Hail
moves.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

moves.name: Nature Power
moves.description: An attack that makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.
